modName: Afro's Skyrim HD 1k Normal Map Pack
summary: For those who are unhappy with lite edition's normal maps and lack of depth
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim HD - Lite (1k) Edition (by Nebula1)
PATCH v1Â by Afrotoast43

=====================================
PATCH NOTES
=====================================

- STANDALONE: you only need to download this if you don't already have skyrimhd - lite edition by Nebula1
- normal maps regenerated and enhanced
- proper mipmaps for normals to decrease load lag
- color maps updated with occlusion and top-down shadows/highlights where appropriate
- low-res normals upresed to 1024x1024
- 2k dragon priest normal added

=====================================
Modder notes
=====================================

I felt this texture pack needed some work. Quite frankly, none of the normal maps had any depth, so I went in and meticulously painted height-maps where needed and generated all normal maps using nDO for photoshop. Everything has a much higher depth and presence to it now.
author: Afrotoast43
